name: Black Diamond Alpine Carbon Cork Wr Trek Poles - Unisex
categories: Alpine Carbon Cork Wr Trek Poles
description: Add comfort to long days on the trail with the Alpine Carbon Cork Trekking Poles. The moisture-wicking cork grips feel great against skin, and the carbon fibre shafts keep the weight low without sacrificing strength. Whippet Ready grip allows you to attach optional accessories to help you travel in the mountains.Natural cork grips are warm in your hands, and soft rubber tops are comfortable.Wrist straps feature a soft lining bonded to a supportive shell.EVA Grip extensions let you shift your grasp without adjusting pole length.Whippet Ready grip technology.Includes carbide Tech Tips and low-profile trekking basketsCompatible with powder baskets (sold separately).
